data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 41,603 believers in the state of Paramaribo to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Paramaribo, Suriname
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Lord, make the 41,603 believers in Paramaribo to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 201,297 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Paramaribo, Suriname who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.prayer: Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Paramaribo, Suriname.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Saramaccan people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Saramaccan people.
Lord, teach the disciples in the state of Paramaribo to trust your Word, like a lamp, in the darkness around them.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.

data.prayer: Father, we ask for networks of simple churches in every city in the state of Paramaribo, like Paul planted in Corinth and Ephesus.
data.verse: The churches in the province of Asia send you greetings. Aquila and Priscilla greet you warmly in the Lord, and so does the church that meets at their house.

data.prayer: Father, provide a good translation of the Bible for the 41,603 believers in Paramaribo, Suriname.

location.name: Paramaribo
location.people_groups_list: Han Chinese, Cantonese, Tiriyo, Jew, Dutch, Sikiana, Han Chinese, Hakka
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Han Chinese, Cantonese (6,800), Tiriyo (2,200), Jew, Dutch (200), Sikiana (30), Han Chinese, Hakka (9,300)
